General.Name: North Electro-Optic Co Ltd
General.Description: North Electro-Optic Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells optoelectronic materials and devices in China and internationally. The company also offers optoelectronic defense products, including large weapon systems, precision guidance seekers, and optoelectronic information equipment. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Xi'an, China.
General.Address: No. 35, Changle Middle Road, Xi'an, China, 710043
